texto: to determine conformance to specified requirements. c) Perform process evaluations. This activity consists of the following tasks: 1) Evaluate project life cycle processes for conformance. 2) Evaluate tools and environments that support or automate the process for conformance. 3) Evaluate supplier processes for conformance to process requirements. NOTE Consider items such as a collaborative software development environment, process measures that suppliers are required to provide, or a risk process that suppliers are required to use. This includes surveillance reviews of process implementation through the supply chain. d) Manage QA records and reports. This activity consists of the following
